snippet.title: One Tap Hero Review [iPhone & iPad]
snippet.description:
This is an unbiased video review of One Tap Hero for the iOS platform (iPhone, iPad & iPod Touch). This mobile game was developed by Coconut Island Studio (http://www.coconutislandstudio.com/) & published by Chillingo (http://www.chillingo.com).  One Tap Hero is an action platformer that focuses on puzzle solving & unique level design to keep you busy for hours.  Amazingly -- that have made all of the varying controls only require one tap!

Purchase One Tap Hero in the iTunes app store for $.99:

 
The review was produced by Tony from the Classic L337 Gaming & Electronic Podcast.
 
Check out our podcast at http://www.classicL337.com
 
Outro Video Produced by BMZLoop http://www.youtube.com/bmzloop
Outro Music Produced by Richie Branson: http://richiebranson.com/
 
SUB US: http://www.youtube.com/classicL337
FOLLOW US: http://www.twitter.com/classicL337
LIKE US: http://www.facebook.com/classicL337
My Twitter: https://twitter.com/tonystemen
 
SITES TO SEE US ON:
G2PO: http://www.g2po.com
Yeousch: http://www.yeousch.com
GotGame: http://www.gotgame.com
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
